question: Does FieldCam store my photos on its servers?
answer: No. FieldCam is an offline-first app. Your photos and videos are stored locally on your device in the Pictures/FieldCam and Movies/FieldCam folders. We have no servers to store your media.

question: Can I use FieldCam without a GPS signal?
answer: Yes, you can still capture photos. The app will use your last known location or device time. However, the GPS verification badge will indicate that coordinates are missing.

question: Is the PDF report customizable?
answer: Currently, you can choose which photos to include and add a project name. We are working on adding custom logos and header information for organizational reports in the next update.
